column4: Provide the ability for authorized users to enter/track contract amendments and revisions.
System supports contract versioning if amendments occur.
Provide the ability for workflow approvals based on business rules when contract amendments occur (e.g., targeted value  increases to require additional workflow).

Provide the ability for an event notification be sent to end users when contract amendments occur (e.g., Purchasing agents listed  on the purchase orders receive notifications of new contract changes).
